item.title: Rmarkdown Child Templates
item.description: title: “main document” output: pdf_document output: pdf_document slug: “rmarkdown-child-templates” aliases: ‘/blog/2021-12-17-rmarkdown-child-templates’ I have recently been working on a set of analyses from a survey at work. This has been really fun, but also a little tedious. The survey has two basic type of questions, likert-scale questions and binary yes/no questions. For each of these two types of questions, Iâ€™ve needed to generate a set of descriptive plots and tables, as well as run a particular set of statistical models.
